long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that makes it easier to visualize Axie Infinity market information more clearly and personally. It allows you to enable or disable the display of various data points such as detailed stats, Axie parts, potential points, and part evolution. You can choose from several display models and decide whether to show all data simultaneously or only the data for the Axie under the mouse cursor. The information updates in real-time, providing fresh and accurate data without needing to reload the page. The extension also offers customizable settings to tailor the display to your preferences..
